channel.title: [PI] Stopping Cheat Clients Help?
channel.description: I need help with this ASAP... I'm using a NON renamed Pi client. I need a way to stop cheat clients from connecting to my server I tryed the UID tut but I didn't have writestreamD or what ever. Could anyone help me?

item.title: [PI] Stopping Cheat Clients Help?
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

I need help with this ASAP… I’m using a NON renamed Pi client. I need a way to stop cheat clients from connecting to my server I tryed the UID tut but I didn’t have writestreamD or what ever. Could anyone help me?

Read full topic
